pets.name: Teddy
pets.description: Teddy has a lot of energy, and needs room to run! He would enjoy a home with a large yard, and loves kids! He gets along well with other dogs.

pets.name: Hercules
pets.description: Hercules is a snuggler! He loves attention, and would make the perfect lap dog companion. We recommend a quiet home with no other pets or small children.

pets.name: Cruella DeVille
pets.description: If youâ€™re looking for a cuddler, Cruella is not your cat. She does her own thing! She is a great mouser, and will enjoy some occasional love. On her own terms, of course.

pets.name: Penelope
pets.description: Penelope is a little lover! She will sit on your lap all day if you let her. She is really mellow and would do well with other animals and children.

pets.name: Tibbs
pets.description: Tibbs is super playful and full of mischief! Would do well with other cats, but not dogs.

pets.name: Zulu
pets.description: Zulu is used to having rule over his domain, and would make a good companion for someone in a quiet home.

pets.name: Belle
pets.description: Belle was brought to us as a rescue. She was born with only three legs, but that doesn't stop her! She is super smart, and would benefit from proper training.

pets.name: Brutus
pets.description: Ah, Brutus. What can we say? His name fits his personality. Would make a good addition to a younger household, as he can be hard to handle.

pets.name: Jackson
pets.description: Jackson came to us after his owner of 8 years passed away. He's looking for a great "retirement" home to live out his golden years.
